history.content:
Hello!

1.) This course load seems a little bit technical heavy but is definitely not impossible. As long as you commit your hours to studying your course material, you should be okay. Note that 170 is one of the "harder" upper-div courses so you'll definitely want to free up time to study for that. Personally, I haven't taken 188 but I heard that it is also a lot of work because you'll be getting quite a few projects throughout the semester. Physics 7A is definitely not an easy course as well but nothing is impossible! 

2.) You may be able to get away with Phase II for CS170 since Wagner/Sinclair/Papad are not teaching it next semester but don't take my word for it. You'll definitely want to Phase I CS188 because it's a pretty popular course (especially as an intro upper-div). I also think that you may be able to Phase II Physics 7A. I gathered this info by looking at Berkeleytime but it is hard to predict future course enrollment so take everything I said with a grain of salt :-)

Good luck!

===

CS 188 can be Phase II'd.

Hello!

1.) This course load seems a little bit technical heavy but is definitely not impossible. As long as you commit your hours to studying your course material, you should be okay. Note that 170 is one of the "harder" upper-div courses so you'll definitely want to free up time to study for that. Personally, I haven't taken 188 but I heard that it is also a lot of work because you'll be getting quite a few projects throughout the semester. Physics 7A is definitely not an easy course as well but nothing is impossible! 

2.) You may be able to get away with Phase II for CS170 since Wagner/Sinclair/Papad are not teaching it next semester but don't take my word for it. You'll definitely want to Phase I CS188 because it's a pretty popular course (especially as an intro upper-div). I also think that you may be able to Phase II Physics 7A. I gathered this info by looking at Berkeleytime but it is hard to predict future course enrollment so take everything I said with a grain of salt :-)

Good luck!

I'm planning to take CS 170, CS 188, Physics 7A, and some upper division HSS course.

1) Does this course load seem reasonable?

2) What should I phase 1 vs.  phase 2? I was considering enrolling in Physics 7A and the HSS course, or Physics 7A and CS 170 for phase 2. Would this be the best choice, or is there a better alternative?
history.subject: Course Load and Phase 1 vs. Phase 2
